verbose_text: Whereas HEV of the genotype (gt) 1 and gt2 are found in people, are transmitted mainly by contaminated water and are causing a high mortality during pregnancy, HEV gt3 and gt4 are swine viruses and do not cause a disease in pigs, however, when they infect humans they may cause in rare cases a zoonotic disease.
evidence: HEV gt3 and gt4 are swine viruses and do not cause a disease in pigs
